clinical_history: Follow-up PET-CT after chemotherapy to assess treatment response.
findings: Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in soft tissue of thigh with SUVmax 11.85.
No evidence of new metastatic lesions compared to prior scan.
Focal increased uptake in soft tissue of thigh, recommend further correlation with CT morphology.
Mild inflammatory uptake in soft tissue of thigh region.
Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in soft tissue of thigh, suggestive of malignancy.
No abnormal FDG uptake in the remaining organs.
recommendations: Repeat PET-CT in 3–6 months to monitor treatment response.
